fields.name: **Gunshot**:
fields.value: Target a player. You will attack them with 1.0x Attack Power.

fields.name: **Power Shot** (x1, Charge 80%):
fields.value: Target a player. You will attack them with 1.5x Attack Power.

fields.name: **AMAB** (Passive):
fields.value: You start the game Male. You can transition to Female the day after shooting a player (even if you didn't kill them). While Female, you have +0.3x Attack Power with Gunshot and Power Shot against players who don't use She/Her when referring to you.
